Lamia:

Lamia sneaked out her Hidding but she didnt like to leave the base =
without nightstrike.  She wander around looking for him, not seeming to und=
erstand  what Lord Perseus said


From: Sandy 
Sent: Saturday, March 06, 20=
10 10:10 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/U=
nicron's come back


  
Quickstride approaches the base with Rat Trap on hi=
s back. Sensing the Minion's signatures he stops abruptly, as Rat Trap clin=
gs to his maine.

"What's the hold up?"

Quickstride looks ahead with ears =
erect.

"Minion signatures... Lord Elder's right, we're not alone... And I =
don't think this is gonna be a walk in the park."

Rat Trap looks up and th=
en at the base.

"Ulp, Primus what'd we get ourselves inta?"

Quickstride l=
ooks up to Rat Trap.

"I'm just as scared as you are, but we made a promise=
 and we have to keep it."

Rat Trap swallows hard.

"You're - right. Wheels=
 and Lord Elder are countn' on us." Let's - go find our comrades'n get the =
word up on what's going on."

Quickstride slowly walks into the base's para=
meter with ears forward, and his head turning to look over his shoulders.

ng a button, his voice could be heard throughout the base.

ions hiding inside the base. Your comrad Marauder would like to

s," he said into the radio. "Ask Marauder who

 "Acknowledged." Legacy's cold voice replied over the channel.
> 
> After a=
 brief pause Legacy reopened the link to Marauder, keeping the
> other Maxi=
mals at the base also in the loop as well. "Marauder."
> Legacy began, his =
voice carrying the slightest hint of curiousness.
> "We are holding no mini=
on prisoner. Whom do you mean?"
> 
> Marauder's voice quickly replied over =
the same channel, his voice calm
> and confident, "The minion known as Lami=
a, she has called out to me,
> you will release her immediately"
>

rauder spoke, Legacy does a scan of the base. "I am picking up a
> sporadic=
 minion energy signature within the base." Legacy said on a

just to the Maximals, "It may indeed be the minion that
> Marauder is refer=
ring to."
> 
> Outside Marauder began to drop lower, twin draconic heads fr=
owning as

ds are
